main.name: Shashank Rai
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Frontend Developer
about.about: I am a Frontend developer based in UP, India. I'm a Master's graduate from KNIT, and my journey in web development began after by graduation of B.Sc From a college in my hometown.
about.about_work: I'm passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications, and I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. Love building full-stack websites and side projects.

projects.name: Project Title
projects.techstack: PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript
